Posts.Content: Jul 9, 2013 08:00PM Kate1983 wrote: Thanks so much for the reply! Ironically, I just purchased my very first front closure sports bra! I'll let you know how it goes!!!
Posts.Title: Anyone else in a similar situation? Kate1983 Kate1983

Posts.Content: Kate1983 wrote: I'm 29 years old..I found a lump about a week ago. I had an ultrasound today which resulted in a recommendation for a biopsy. Yikes. How do I prepare?! I meet with a surgeon on Thursday. I know worrying won't help so I just need some support and positive thoughts..I've never had to do something like this before! I'll post again after my appt Thursday. Log in to post a reply
